Package com.vagsoft.bookstore.controllers

Class OrderItemController

java.lang.Object
com.vagsoft.bookstore.controllers.OrderItemController
@RestController @RequestMapping(path="/orders") @Validated(OrderedValidation.class) public class OrderItemController extends Object
REST controller for endpoints related to order items

    • getOrderItems

      @IsAdmin @GetMapping("/{orderID}/items") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<OrderItemReadDTO>> getOrderItems(@PathVariable @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) @ExistsResource(repository=OrderRepository.class,message="Order with the given ID does not exist",groups=ExtendedValidation.class) @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) Integer orderID, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves a page of order items for the specified order ID.
      Parameters:
      orderID - the ID of the order to retrieve items for
      pageable - the pagination information
      Returns:
      a page of OrderItemReadDTO objects

    • getOrderItemByBookID

      @IsAdmin @GetMapping("/{orderID}/items/{bookID}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<OrderItemReadDTO> getOrderItemByBookID(@PathVariable @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) Integer orderID, @PathVariable @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) @ExistsCompositeResource(repository=OrderItemsRepository.class,methodName="existsByOrderIdAndBookId",firstPathVariable="orderID",secondPathVariable="bookID",message="The order with the given ID does not contain the book with the given ID",groups=ExtendedValidation.class) @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) Integer bookID)
      Retrieves an order item by the specified order ID and book ID.
      Parameters:
      orderID - the ID of the order
      bookID - the ID of the book
      Returns:
      an OrderItemReadDTO object representing the order item

    • getOrderMeItems

      @GetMapping("/me/{orderID}/items") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<OrderItemReadDTO>> getOrderMeItems(@PathVariable @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) @ExistsCompositeResource(repository=OrderRepository.class,methodName="existsByUser_IdAndId",useJWT=true,secondPathVariable="orderID",message="The order with the given ID does not exist in your submitted orders",groups=ExtendedValidation.class) @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) Integer orderID, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves a page of order items for the specified order ID, accessible only to the user who placed the order.
      Parameters:
      orderID - the ID of the order to retrieve items for
      pageable - the pagination information
      Returns:
      a page of OrderItemReadDTO objects

    • getOrderMeItemByBookID

      Retrieves an order item by the specified order ID and book ID, accessible only to the user who placed the order.
      Parameters:
      orderID - the ID of the order
      bookID - the ID of the book
